Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4902 NORTH BILTMORE LANE, MADISON, Wisconsin, 53718, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Alliant Energy is the parent of two regulated utilities, Interstate Power and Light and Wisconsin Power and Light, serving nearly 1 million electricity and natural gas customers and approximately 420,000 natural gas-only customers. Both subsidiaries engage in the generation and distribution of electricity and the distribution and transportation of natural gas. Alliant also owns a 16% interest in American Transmission Co.

value.name: Alberto G. Ruocco
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
